name: Mystic Runner (Nubilum Games)
description:
Fight aliens and avoid obstacles in Mystic Runner!

Mystic Runner is an action packed endless runner with plenty of enemies! It also features a great soundtrack and fun gameplay.

There are many plans for Mystic Runner so be on the lookout for updates in the future!

 The game was made in GameMaker Studio.CREDITS:

Founder and project leader: Cyron

Programming: Ma31n

Art: Ma31n

SFX & Music: Señor Olaf
